org.apache.storm.topology

インタフェース IRichBolt

  • すべてのスーパーインタフェース:
    IBolt, IComponent, Serializable
    既知の実装クラスのリスト:
    AbstractEsBolt, AbstractHBaseBolt, AbstractHdfsBolt, AbstractJdbcBolt, AbstractMongoBolt, AbstractRedisBolt, AvroGenericRecordBolt, BaseCassandraBolt, BaseRichBolt, BaseStatefulBoltExecutor, BasicBoltExecutor, BatchBoltExecutor, BatchCassandraWriterBolt, BlobStoreAPIWordCountTopology.SplitSentence, BoltTracker, CassandraWriterBolt, CheckpointTupleForwarder, ClojureBolt, CoordinatedBolt, EsIndexBolt, EsLookupBolt, EsPercolateBolt, EventHubBolt, ExclamationTopology.ExclamationBolt, FluxShellBolt, HBaseBolt, HBaseLookupBolt, HdfsBolt, HdfsSpoutTopology.ConstBolt, HiveBolt, JdbcInsertBolt, JdbcLookupBolt, JoinResult, KafkaBolt, KeyedFairBolt, MongoInsertBolt, MongoUpdateBolt, MqttBolt, MultipleLoggerTopology.ExclamationLoggingBolt, PythonShellMetricsBolt, RedisLookupBolt, RedisStoreBolt, ResourceAwareExampleTopology.ExclamationBolt, ReturnResults, RichShellBolt, RollingCountAggBolt, RollingCountBolt, SequenceFileBolt, SingleJoinBolt, SolrUpdateBolt, StatefulBoltExecutor, StatefulWindowedBoltExecutor, TestAggregatesCounter, TestEventOrderCheckBolt, TestGlobalCount, TestPlannerBolt, TransactionalSpoutBatchExecutor, TridentBoltExecutor, TupleCaptureBolt, WindowedBoltExecutor, WordCountTopology.SplitSentence, WordCountTopologyNode.SplitSentence

    public interface IRichBolt
extends IBolt, IComponent

    When writing topologies using Java, IRichBolt and IRichSpout are the main interfaces to use to implement components of the topology.

    • メソッドのサマリー

      • インタフェースから継承されたメソッド org.apache.storm.task.IBolt

        cleanup, execute, prepare

      • インタフェースから継承されたメソッド org.apache.storm.topology.IComponent

        declareOutputFields, getComponentConfiguration
